name: Hector tracker launch
tagline: High level launch files for the hector tracker robot
body:
| Topic        | Type           | Description  |
| ------------- |-------------| -----|
| **Base Motion** |
| /cmd_vel      | geometry_msgs/Twist | Commanded velocity (will be filtered by vehicle_controller |
| /cmd_vel_raw  | geometry_msgs/Twist      | Commanded velocity to robot base (directly applied) |
| /move_base/simple_goal  | geometry_msgs/PoseStamped     | Goal for robot to drive to (mainly used from rviz) |
| /drivepath  | nav_msgs/Path | Path planned for robot to follow |
| **Arm Motion** |
| /tracker_controllers/arm_traj_controller/follow_joint_trajectory/goal      | [control_msgs/FollowJointTrajectoryAction](https://github.com/ros-controls/control_msgs/blob/indigo-devel/control_msgs/action/FollowJointTrajectory.action) | Action interface for commanding arm trajectories |
| /tracker_controllers/arm_traj_controller/command   | [trajectory_msgs/JointTrajectory](http://docs.ros.org/jade/api/trajectory_msgs/html/msg/JointTrajectory.html)      | Topic interface for commanding arm trajectories |
| /tracker_controllers/sensor_head_traj_controller/follow_joint_trajectory/goal      | [control_msgs/FollowJointTrajectoryAction](https://github.com/ros-controls/control_msgs/blob/indigo-devel/control_msgs/action/FollowJointTrajectory.action) | Action interface for commanding sensor head trajectories |
| /tracker_controllers/sensor_head_traj_controller/command   | [trajectory_msgs/JointTrajectory](http://docs.ros.org/jade/api/trajectory_msgs/html/msg/JointTrajectory.html)      | Topic interface for commanding sensor head trajectories |
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
